recommended_degree: Hospitality dan Pariwisata, Perhotelan, Bahasa Inggris, Tata Boga (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_title: Food and Beverage Service-Holiday Inn Lampung Bukit Randu
job_description:
Main Responsibilities: 
Greet and serve guests professionally in the restaurant, cafe, room service, or banquet areas.
Take food and beverage orders accurately and deliver items promptly.
Set up dining areas, table arrangements, and buffet stations according to hotel standards.
Ensure cleanliness, proper sanitation, and readiness of all service areas.
Provide menu recommendations and explain food or beverage details when needed.
Handle guest complaints or requests with courtesy and escalate to supervisor if required.
Collaborate closely with kitchen, bar, and banquet teams for smooth service coordination.
Follow hygiene, safety, and sanitation procedures in accordance with IHG and hotel policies.
Support event operations, including weddings, meetings, and special functions.

Qualifications:
Male/Female.
Experience in F&B service or hospitality is an advantage.
Good communication skills and a strong guest service mindset.
Knowledge of basic table service, etiquette, and dining procedures.
Ability to work under pressure and maintain composure in fast paced environments.
Well groomed, polite, and professional.
Willing to work flexible shifts (morning, evening, weekends, holidays).
Strong teamwork, discipline, and positive attitude.
